name: Secret Necromancer
description:
Objective:
This is a secret roles type game, there are 2 groups with different objectives.

Role: Necromancer
A lone, corrupted sorcerer whose only objective is to murder the Grandmaster and add his might to the undead horde. His identity is unknown.
Role: Sorcerers
Sorcerers must defend the Grandmaster and help root out and destroy the Necromancer.
Role: Grandmaster
The Grandmaster is the ONLY individual that players can be sure is NOT a Necromancer. His goal is to destroy the Necromancer.

Required Players: 4
Maximum Players: 5

Servers are available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.
Clients are available for Windows and Linux.

The server host needs to make sure the port they're using is open so that people can connect. The clients NEED the host's IP address to join.

The first person to join the server is the "VIP" and has the authority to start the game once 4 players are in.

Instructions and prompts will become more clear in post-jam builds. We ran out of time :)

For more help contact the developers, Jeremy Glebe or Zach Kingcade. Thanks a lot for checking out our game and have fun!

Final Note: If you're interested in testing the game by yourself, you can launch 4 clients and a server all on your machine. Make sure to connect with 4 different usernames. You won't need to open ports. Connect to either "0.0.0.0" or "localhost".
